text: Imran Ahmad (born 22 February 1948) is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the incumbent Minister of Expatriates' Welfare and Overseas Employment. He is a member of parliament from Sylhet-4. ==Career== Ahmad has a tea plantation and consultancy business. He was elected to parliament from Sylhet-4 on 5 January 2014. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1948 births Category:People from Gowainghat Upazila Category:Awami League politicians Category:Expatriates' Welfare and Overseas Employment ministers Category:State Ministers of Expatriates' Welfare and Overseas Employment (Bangladesh) Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Imran Ahmad
